casebody.data:
State
v.
Michael Eugene Reed, II 232P01-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Mr. Michael Eugene Reed, II, for Reed, Michael Eugene II. Mr. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. David Learner, District Attorney, for State of N.C. The following order has been on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016." Hudson, J. recused
